materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Commercial Square in Singapore. The photograph shows a road, with multi-storeyed buildings and shophouses on the right and trees on the left. There are vehicles along the road. There are a few people standing along the top balcony on the building on the right. The photograph is slightly faded around the edges. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Commercial Square, Singapore
subject_terms_1: street scenes business districts squares (open spaces) colonization
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Central business districts Singapore Colonization
